title: Calories in 3 Strawberries
meta_description: Discover calories in 3 strawberries, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks.
assumptions: Fresh, medium-sized strawberries (about 12 g each), whole, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged berries when available.

quick_answer.text: Three medium strawberries offer about 12 kcal, mainly from natural sugars, with 0.6 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp whipped cream per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one strawberry?
faqs.a: About 4 kcal for one medium fresh strawberry.
Yes, 3 strawberries have just 2.7 g carbs, mostly natural sugars.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in 3 strawberries?
faqs.a: Approximately 0.6 g of dietary fiber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Do strawberries have any fat or protein?
faqs.a: Negligible fat (0 g) and low protein (0.3 g) in 3 strawberries.

faqs.q: How does strawberry size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger strawberries add more calories; medium ones are about 4 kcal each, large around 6 kcal.
